speaker: detective
dialogue: She turns to look at me, she looks away, she tells the cab driver to wait a little longer.

speaker: detective
dialogue: "Sheila I just found your note, what's going on?"

speaker: sheila
dialogue: "I have to go, I have too many debts in this city, I can't stay here any longer."

speaker: detective
dialogue: "Sheila, don't leave! We can figure something out!"

speaker: sheila
dialogue: "This is the best course of action Darling, trust me. But you'll be ok, don't worry about it."

speaker: detective
dialogue: I see the pain in her eyes, it's as tough for her as it is for me but what should I do?
